lead_paragraph: Former U.S. Open champion Juan Martin del Potro will attempt to extend his remarkable comeback in 2016 when he launches the 2017 season at Auckland's ASB Tennis Classic in January.

headline.print_headline: Del Potro to Open 2017 Season in Auckland
headline.main: Del Potro to Open 2017 Season in Auckland
